name: Jigsaw Puzzles: Water Castles
description:
Admire to the charm of old castles! By solving this collection you can take a feel of the old days, at time when the world was ruled by kings and queens. These amazing structures are not only an architectural beauty, but also mysterious, and with every move you will become more closer to the key of these mysteries.

Features:
- 4 levels of complexity: 7x6 (42 pieces), 9x8 (72 pieces), 13x11 (143 pieces), 18x16 (288 pieces) - available for any puzzle.
- Easy-to-operate control.
- Move parts in groups.
- Easy preview.
- Rotate pieces to fit the right place.
- Big choice of backgrounds!
